analytics_data_platform_deploy_descripti: OVH Analytics Data Platform contains all the tools to ingest, clean, process and visualize vast amounts data. We deploy a preconfigured and fully secured Apache Hadoop cluster, on top of OVH Public Cloud compute and storage resources. Then, simply upload your data or add data collector for real-time flows, and follow our documentation to make us of Analytics Data Platform benefits.
analytics_data_platform_deploy_general_v: OVH Analytics Data Platform is a HDP 2.6 based Hadoop, secured with Kerberos and Identity Manager, deployed in OVH Public Cloud.
analytics_data_platform_deploy_cluster_n: Cluster name must contain 3 to 20 characters. Only lowercase letters, '-' and numbers are allowed. Must end with a character or number.
analytics_data_platform_deploy_public_cl: Please select the public cloud project you want to deploy to
You need a Public Cloud project to deploy an Analytics Data Platform.
analytics_data_platform_deploy_private_n: Please select the vRack to use

analytics_data_platform_deploy_password_: Warning : OVH doesn’t store your password. Please save it safely. If you lose it, you will be unable to access your cluster
analytics_data_platform_deploy_master_pa: Password must have 12 to 64 characters and contain at least 1 number, 1 special character, and one uppercase letter.
Password must match with the master password entered
Please type your master password again
Must contain at least one number
Must contain at least one special character
Must contain at least one upper-case letter
Must have minimum 12 and maximum 64 characters
analytics_data_platform_deploy_ssh_key_p: Please select the SSH keypair to use

analytics_data_platform_deploy_worker_no:
Nodes running jobs, providing compute capacity.

Storage capacity is directly related to workers.
analytics_data_platform_deploy_edge_node: Nodes hosting users home for services access
analytics_data_platform_deploy_master_no:
Nodes running the services coordination.

Amount and flavor are defined by OVH.
analytics_data_platform_deploy_utility_n:
Utility services : database, identity management, gateway.

Amount and flavor are defined by OVH.
analytics_data_platform_deploy_bastion_n:
Provides user access to Data Platform from public network.

Amount and flavor are defined by OVH.

analytics_data_platform_deploy_storage_e: Edge nodes are instances of the cluster between the users and other machines of clusters. Users can run their jobs on the edge nodes instead of doing it directly on the master nodes, which are critical from the overall functioning. This way you can prevent capacity loss on these nodes.
analytics_data_platform_deploy_storage_c: Define the effective HDFS storage space you want for your cluster. This storage will be located in multiple volumes and replicated.
analytics_data_platform_deploy_storage_h: This can be modified via Ambari after deployment
analytics_data_platform_deploy_quota_err: Public cloud project, {{cloud_name}}, does not meet required quota requirements to deploy Analytics Data Platform.
You can increase quota for the public cloud, {{cloud_name}}, or change nodes configuration under 'Size the nodes' step.
analytics_data_platform_deploy_quota_min: Minimun {{numberOfServers}} nodes are required to deploy Analytics Data Platform. Under your current quota, you can create up to a maximum of {{ instances }} nodes for the {{ region }} region.
analytics_data_platform_deploy_review_in: The following cluster will be deployed
We deploy with hourly billing by default. You will be able to switch to monthly billing directly in you public cloud project, after the cluster creation.
